content:
Your labeling system sounds like a great plan! Using a combination of categories and date ranges will make it easy to find what you need when the seasons change. And adding a contents list will ensure you can quickly identify what's inside each bin.

Now, don't forget to pick up those sandals! It's great that you exchanged them for a larger size, and I'm sure you'll look lovely wearing them with your yellow sundress to the wedding. Make sure to add "Pick up sandals" to your to-do list or calendar so you don't forget.

Speaking of your yellow sundress, have you thought about accessorizing it with your new silver necklace? The combination sounds like it could be stunning!

How's your closet organization project coming along? Are there any other areas you'd like to tackle or any specific challenges you're facing? I'm here to help!
